flowers.name: Peashooter
flowers.Desc: Peashooters are your first line of defense. They shoot peas at attacking zombies.

flowers.name: clever
flowers.Desc: Blovers blow away all balloon zombies and fog.

flowers.name: Snow Pea
flowers.Desc: Snow Peas shoot frozen peas that damage and slow the enemy.

flowers.name: Wall-nut
flowers.Desc: Tall-nuts are heavy-duty wall plants that can't be vaulted over.

flowers.name: Potato Mine
flowers.Desc: Potato Mines pack a powerful punch, but they need a while to arm themselves. You should plant them ahead of zombies. They will explode on contact.

flowers.name: Sunflower
flowers.Desc: Sunflowers are essential for you to produce extra sun. Try planting as many as you can!

flowers.name: Jalapeno
flowers.Desc: Jalapenos destroy an entire lane of zombies

flowers.name: Cherry Bomb
flowers.Desc: Cherry Bombs can blow up all zombies in an area. They have a short fuse so plant them near zombies.
